Topic.Title: How to make the script run another language characters?

Posts.EditableText:
Hi, I am new to the coding.
I am using another language characters for the rooms and objects name in Quest.
Also on the Verbs.
But the script seem can't understand the another language characters.

I am thinking if I should edit the English.aslx.
However, what and where should I put in to make the Quest run another language characters in its script?
Thank you!
Posts.HTML:
Hi, I am new to the coding.
I am using another language characters for the rooms and objects name in Quest.
Also on the Verbs.
But the script seem can't understand the another language characters.

I am thinking if I should edit the English.aslx.
However, what and where should I put in to make the Quest run another language characters in its script?
Thank you!

Posts.EditableText:
I have found the answer here!

http://textadventures.co.uk/forum/quest/topic/r4sjx1kvskebhsdg9zht3a/what-programming-language-does-quest-use
Put all the variables in English and only print the text in Greek.

Thanks!
Posts.HTML:
I have found the answer here!

http://textadventures.co.uk/forum/quest/topic/r4sjx1kvskebhsdg9zht3a/what-programming-language-does-quest-use
Put all the variables in English and only print the text in Greek.

Thanks!
